greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Iterate A064920 until a prime is reached.
comment: Well defined since A064920(n) < n for nonprimes.
a(p) = p for all primes p.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
program: (PARI) gpf(n)= { local(f); f=factor(n)~; return(f[1, length(f)]) } { for (n=2, 1000, m=n; while (!isprime(m), g=gpf(m); m=m / g + g - 1); write("b064921.txt", n, " ", m) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Sep 29 2009
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 14 2001
